        protected boolean accept(Assignment<V,T> assignment,
                         Model<V,T> model,
                         Neighbour<V,T> neighbour,
                         double value,
                         boolean lazy)
        Accept any move that does not worsen the solution (value <= 0) or that is below the bound. Also increase the step counter.
        Overrides:
        accept in class HillClimber.HillClimberContext
        Parameters:
        assignment - current assignment
        model - problem model
        neighbour - a generated move
        value - value of the generated move (i.e., its impact on the solution value)
        lazy - true if lazy move
        Returns:
        true if the generated move is to be assigned
